abstract: Brazilian mining giant Vale said Tuesday it was preparing a share offering worth up to $15 billion to help finance organic growth and potential acquisitions, but denied it was in talks on an acquisition.
lead_paragraph: Brazilian mining giant Vale said Tuesday it was preparing a share offering worth up to $15 billion to help finance organic growth and potential acquisitions, but denied it was in talks on an acquisition.

headline.main: Vale Plans to Raise $15 Billion in Share Sale, Amid Deal Chatter
